job.title: Senior Embedded Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer Networking
job.description: Job Title: <strong>Senior Embedded Software Engineer<br><br></strong>Location: <strong>Mountain View, CA<br><br></strong>Duration: <strong>Full time / Long Term Contract<br><br></strong><strong><u>Required Skills<br><br></u></strong>Very experienced with embedded systems<br><ul><li> Being able to design and develop software that works well in resource constrained environments (CPU, battery, networking, memory, etc)</li><li> Familiar with work closer to the hardware<br></li></ul>Being a generalist with firmware and embedded work<br><ul><li> Have a wider breath of expertise</li><li> Be ready for ongoing changes and innovation</li><li> No specific single platform (e.g., chipset or specific RTOS) is required, but the ability to quickly learn, and a solid engineering foundation<br></li></ul>Experience with RTOS<br><br>Excellent software engineering skills<br><ul><li> Not just “hacking” code together, but writing rock solid software</li><li> Creating readable, maintainable and extensible code</li><li> Understand secure code<br></li></ul>Excellent software design skills<br><ul><li> Plan before coding</li><li> Creating good software design documents</li><li> Being able to collaboratively improve designs together with stakeholders<br></li></ul>Solid understanding of<br><ul><li> Multithreading</li><li> Concurrency</li><li> Reentrance<br></li></ul>C programming at very solid level<br><br><strong><u>Preferred (Bonus) Skills<br></u></strong><ul><li> Strong expertise in communication protocols</li><li> Custom protocols on top of TCP/IP, Bluetooth, WiFi or similar</li><li> Designing or extending protocols</li><li> Debugging and testing communication</li><li> Experience with lossy communication, making communication robust</li><li> Experience with test automation for embedded systems</li><li> Experience with code refactoring</li><li> Experience with “bare-metal” embedded systems</li><li> Experience with real-time embedded Linux OS</li><li> Experience with IoT, sensors</li><li> C++ programming at solid level<br></li></ul><strong>You can also apply via: </strong>http://jobd.info/?id=fiLKOE<br><br><strong><u>Recruiter Details<br><br></u></strong><strong>Praveen Rao<br><br></strong>(302) 214-0551<br><br>praveen_us@falconsmartit.com<br><br>Find all current job openings at our Career Page<br><br>https://www.falconsmartit.com/FalconCareer.html<br><br>Follow us on LinkedIn for Job Opportunities<br><br>https://www.linkedin.com/company/falconsmartit/
